sentences.english: Fourth, we should develop the atmosphere of "attack against sinister gangs" in the whole society.

sentences.english: It is one of the important aspects to struggle against organized crimes with the nature of sinister society.
sentences.chinese: “打黑除恶”是严打整治斗争的重点之一。
